name: east
chn: n., adj. & adv. 东方, 东方的, 向东
example_en: The sun rises in the east.
memory_tips: 词源：来自古英语 'ēast'，与德语 'Osten' 同源。联想记忆：想象太阳从东方升起，'east' 是太阳升起的方向。图像记忆：画一个太阳从地平线上升起的场景，标注 'east' 方向。

image_prompt.main_image: A vibrant sunrise scene with the sun peeking over the horizon, casting golden light across a calm ocean. The word 'EAST' is prominently displayed in bold letters at the bottom of the image.
image_prompt.example_image: A simple illustration of a globe with an arrow pointing to the right side, labeled 'EAST', showing the direction of the sunrise.
